episode: My car used to have a problem that would lead to the battery being drained extremely fast.  One time, the battery actually died while I was driving.  It was pretty scary and could have been a really bad situation if things went a little differently.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I still remember that time my car battery died while I was driving.  It was pretty scary.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds terrifying. What happened next?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was just about to pull onto the freeway, so luckily I was able to just pull off onto the shoulder and park.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That was lucky. Were you able to get help quickly?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Fortunately I didn't need help.  I just waited a few minutes and my car started back up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a relief! Must have been a loose connection or something.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I can't remember exactly what it was when the mechanic eventually figured it out, but something like that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad it was an easy fix in the end.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Easy but not quick.  I drove with my car acting like that for a few years I think.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You must have been worried it would happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Oh yeah.  In the back of my mind I was always a little afraid of it happening again.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's understandable. Must have been stressful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was.  Luckily, that was the only time it happened while driving, but on more than one occasion I would find my battery dead just for not driving for a day or two.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's frustrating. Sounds like the problem was intermittent.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Very.  Sometimes it was fine for a month, other times it would be dead even though I had just driven to the store or something.  It was frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine. Must have been annoying not knowing when it would happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly.  It was very unpredictable so I had to always be prepared for it to happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Always being on edge like that can be really draining.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really was.  I can't believe I put up with it for so long.  No one should have to deal with that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like a huge relief that it's finally fixed.
